attributes.action: amend planning laws to require that adequate childrens play facilities must be provided on new housing developments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In addition, we request the Prime Minister disallows the Planning Inspectorate from overturning any council planning refusal when that decision has been made based on a lack of provision for young people in the area.
This will help prevent widespread anti-social behaviour breeding in new housing developments.
